item.title: An Introduction to Writing
item.description: You need to develop a broad spectrum of style and then be able to move from one end of the spectrum to the other as occasion demands. You'll develop a basic style but inability to diversify is being like a baller with a drive but no jump shot. Questions to ask: What am I writing about? Who will read what I've written? Why did I write it? I'm writing about topics that I want to know more about.

item.title: The New Strategy of Style [Weathers, Winston]
